V.i.1.C.3.b
.
Dismissing Claims Unsupported by Law
When a claim is unsupported by law, the claim
should be dismissed as a result of the lack of legal merit
does not require any development action, and
does not require a rating decision.
Note
:Â  The claim must clearly be unsupported by law to be dismissed.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section C - Pre-Rating Review of Claims by the Rating Activity
citation: Part V, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section C
